code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es6",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "outDir": "build",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules/**/*"],
  "extends": ["@ts-eslint/eslint-plugin"],
  "ts-node": {
    "transpileOnly": true
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^14.14.38",
    "@types/express": "^4.17.16",
    "@types/mongodb": "^3.6.39",
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "mongodb": "^3.6.4",
    "mongoose": "^5.13.8",
    "socket.io": "^4.5.4",
    "typescript": "^4.2.3"
  }
}
